channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- CPG BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- CPG BIOS

item.title: CVE-2023-32453|2024-10-02T16:01:10.104Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an improper authentication vulnerability. A malicious user with physical access to the system may potentially exploit this vulnerability in order to modify a security-critical UEFI variable without knowledge of the BIOS administrator.

item.title: CVE-2023-32475|2024-08-02T15:18:37.099Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains a missing support for integrity check vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to the system could potentially bypass security mechanisms to run arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-28970|2024-08-02T01:03:51.496Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client BIOS contains an Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to platform denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0160|2024-08-01T17:41:16.055Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to the system could potentially exploit this vulnerability by bypassing BIOS authorization to modify settings in the BIOS.

item.title: CVE-2024-0158|2024-08-01T17:41:16.039Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an improper input validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to modify a UEFI variable, leading to denial of service and escalation of privileges

item.title: CVE-2024-0158|2024-07-02T06:20:44.735Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an improper input validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user with admin privileges may potentially exploit this vulnerability to modify a UEFI variable, leading to denial of service and escalation of privileges

item.title: CVE-2024-32855|2024-06-25T04:06:39.172Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information tampering.

item.title: CVE-2024-32858|2024-06-13T16:09:43.292Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32860|2024-06-13T13:00:19.384Z -- dell -- cpg%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.
